name: Lucky Shots
description:
Lucky Shots - A free game in which accuracy and agility are very important. Shoot the right places and collect the coins. You can either pass levels or try to break the level record. Shoot your way forward to victory !

Lucky Shots has a wide variety of game modes, including:
• Puzzle-Sliders - Shoot strategically to Win ! 
• Puzzle Games - Figure out these head-scratchers to win the coins ! 
• Brain Teasers - Test yourself. Train your brain.
• Labyrinth Games - Navigate your way to Victory !
• Hidden Objects - Find the Hidden Objects but BEWARE !
• Physics Puzzles. 
• Retro Games - Relive classic game modes. 
• Action Games - Run and Gun as much as you can! 
• Sport Games - If you often shoot and move your fingers, then maybe this is considered as a sport.
• Shooting Games - Shoot as Master !
